name: Carrot Cafe Demo
description:
You'll be playing as Satoshi. A high-school newly grad who'll be working in Carrot Cafe, an all-girls maid cafe.

If you liked this demo, consider supporting it on Patreon. The Uncensored Version will be available on June 7 (on my patreon page).

I would love to hear your feedback. :)

https://www.patreon.com/sootface
